column5: Where will the first place you will try if the spawn is over, Shallow weedy bay's? pre-summer spots? or still in the rivers?
inside and outside of any moving water (inlets and outlets)

This time of year.. so easy anywhere there is a major creek or river dumping in to a bay. Second if there is anyplace with beginning weed growth, (usually takes a little experience with the lake) good luck. GF
